Name: RailRoadVR
About the game: A Simple VR Arcade Style Rail Shooter Early Access - Fully Playable Levels Enjoy taking turns with your friends with this twin gun shooter A range of themed levels including; Halloween Theme: Simple!! Just shoot all of the pumpkins! Western Theme: Shoot all bottles, explosives and other objects to gain points and coins Snow Theme: The snowmen have stolen of the gifts! Retake as many gifts as you can, destroy the snowmen before they take them back from you! Still to come; More themed levels Pyramids, Mine-Carts, Sci-fi Drones? Broomsticks? Easter Eggs! Steam Achievements For best experience, put a chair in the middle of your play space and align chair to the game vehicle while in the menu screen.
